qa.name: Professor Amelia Lockhart
qa.appearance: Mid-length brown hair, glasses, athletic build

json_to_edit.voice_over: The mask called to me, its ancient power pulsing through the ages.
json_to_edit.description: Professor Lockhart discovers an ancient mask in a hidden temple chamber.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant jungle sounds, wind whistling through stone corridors
json_to_edit.name: The Mask's Revelation
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Professor Lockhart uncovers an ancient mask that begins to affect her identity.

qa.action: A dense jungle canopy parts to reveal an ancient temple structure.

hf.action: Professor Lockhart enters a vast, dimly lit chamber filled with ancient artifacts.

tr.action: Lockhart approaches a stone pedestal where the mask rests, her eyes wide with anticipation.

xc.action: The intricately carved mask gleams in a shaft of sunlight, its empty eyes seeming to stare at Lockhart.

ka.sfx_keywords: fabric shifting, sharp intake of breath
ka.action: Lockhart's hands tremble as she reaches out to touch the mask.

fn.sfx_keywords: skin contact with stone, magical hum
fn.action: Lockhart's fingertips make contact with the mask, a faint glow emanating from where they touch.

af.action: Lockhart lifts the mask, her expression a mix of awe and trepidation.

qo.action: The mask hovers inches from Lockhart's face, its empty eyes now seeming alive and beckoning.

edit_command: Add three more shots showing the mask's effect on Professor Lockhart after she puts it on.

updated_json.voice_over: The mask called to me, its ancient power pulsing through the ages.
updated_json.description: Professor Lockhart discovers an ancient mask in a hidden temple chamber and experiences its transformative effects.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant jungle sounds, wind whistling through stone corridors
updated_json.name: The Mask's Revelation
updated_json.scene_summary: Professor Lockhart uncovers an ancient mask that begins to affect her identity and transforms her.

qa.action: A dense jungle canopy parts to reveal an ancient temple structure.

hf.action: Professor Lockhart enters a vast, dimly lit chamber filled with ancient artifacts.

tr.action: Lockhart approaches a stone pedestal where the mask rests, her eyes wide with anticipation.

xc.action: The intricately carved mask gleams in a shaft of sunlight, its empty eyes seeming to stare at Lockhart.

ka.sfx_keywords: fabric shifting, sharp intake of breath
ka.action: Lockhart's hands tremble as she reaches out to touch the mask.

fn.sfx_keywords: skin contact with stone, magical hum
fn.action: Lockhart's fingertips make contact with the mask, a faint glow emanating from where they touch.

af.action: Lockhart lifts the mask, her expression a mix of awe and trepidation.

qo.action: The mask hovers inches from Lockhart's face, its empty eyes now seeming alive and beckoning.

bx.action: Lockhart places the mask on her face, her eyes widening as it adheres to her skin.

yz.action: A whirlwind of energy surrounds Lockhart, her body rigid as the mask's power courses through her.

lm.action: The energy dissipates, revealing Lockhart's transformed appearance - her eyes now glowing with an otherworldly light.

label.rationale: we will add three more shots to the scene, showing the mask's effect on professor lockhart after she puts it on. this will extend the narrative and create a more dramatic sequence. we'll update the number_of_shots from 8 to 11 and add three new shots to the "shots" object. we'll also update the list_display_order to include the new shots. the new shots will show the transformation process and its immediate effects on professor lockhart.
